betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Forestry is a mod about using machines to automate your agriculture with machines and also using bees to acquire resources.

Most forestry machines work in that you set a recipe by placing the recipe of what you want to craft in it (it won't consume them) and then placing said items you craft it with in its internal inventory. It will then need power and potentially liquids put in it before it can work.

The carpenter will also often require you to place in item in the top slot for it to work.

You will probably want more than one of these, one for each fluid usually.

Also pretty much every forestry machine, ie uses a machine frame, uses power.
